Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-50658 affecting package telegraf for versions less than 1.29.4-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-50658 affecting package telegraf for versions less than 1.29.4-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package telegraf is earlier than 1.29.4-1, affected by CVE-2023-50658
